heliolib.irradiance_transposition_service.transpose_irradiance module

class heliolib.irradiance_transposition_service.transpose_irradiance.TransposeIrradiance(latitude, longitude, altitude, df)[source]

Bases: object

A class for transposing Global Horizontal Irradiance (GHI) to Plane of Array (POA) Irradiance.

Parameters

latitude (float):

Latitude of the location in degrees (-90 to 90).

longitude (float):

Longitude of the location in degrees (-180 to 180).

altitude (float):

Altitude of the location in meters above sea level.

df (pandas.DataFrame):

DataFrame with time-aware UTC index and GHI values.

Methods

utc_transposition_model(surface_tilt, surface_azimuth):

Transposes GHI to POA for a given surface tilt and azimuth angle.

surface_tilt (float):

Tilt angle of the solar panel surface in degrees. [0, 90]

surface_azimuth (float):

Azimuth angle of the solar panel surface in degrees. [0, 359]

pandas.DataFrame:

DataFrame with transposed POA values.

get_clearsky_ghi()[source]

Calculate clear sky global horizontal irradiance (GHI) parameters.

Returns

pandas.DataFrame:

DataFrame containing clear sky GHI parameters for each time.

get_clearsky_poa(surface_tilt, surface_azimuth)[source]

Calculate clear sky plane-of-array (POA) irradiance parameters.

Parameters

surface_tilt (float):

Tilt angle of the surface in degrees.

surface_azimuth (float):

Azimuth angle of the surface in degrees.

Returns

pandas.DataFrame:

DataFrame containing clear sky POA parameters for each time.

utc_transposition_model(surface_tilt, surface_azimuth)[source]

Transposes GHI (Global Horizontal Irradiance) to POA (Plane of Array Irradiance).

Parameters

surface_tilt (float):

Tilt angle of the solar panel surface.

surface_azimuth (float):

Azimuth angle of the solar panel surface.

Returns

pandas.DataFrame:

DataFrame containing transposed POA values.
